name: Robo Puzzle Smash
description: Robo Puzzle Smash is an intensely addictive competitive puzzle game that will test your wits and skill against your opponent in a high-energy, block bashing brawl with a twist! Drop the blocks and rotate your field to match colored blocks together and set up combos.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600 Storage: 1 GB available space
